nodes.text: The TF-4 Rampage was an industrial mining repulsorlift landspeeder available during the time of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Favoured by criminals and popular on the black market, it featured heavy armor and aggressive engines which could be modified turning it into a rapid-attack craft.
The TF-4 Rampage was first introduced as a reward mount given to players in Star Wars: The Old Republic who had been a premium player as of May 31st, 2018.
